name: lynne588_walt-disney-world-ride-data
title: Walt Disney World Ride Data
description:
This shows a variety of characteristics related to the current Walt Disney World ride-specific attractions.

This data set was originally curated for my masters capstone project where we were designing a new hypothetical new ride for the WDW resort. We wanted to explore the distributions of different characteristics for current rides to determine what isn't being represented/covered. There is a wide variety of characteristics in this data set including location, type, age group interest, ratings, how long the ride has been open, and much more. 

Data sources that were used to collect the characteristics:

https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/attractions/
http://www.wdwinfo.com/wdwinfo/ridelength.htm
https://www.wdwmagic.com/attractions/toy-story-land/news/28jun2018-ride-duration-for-slinky-dog-dash-and-alien-swirling-saucers.htm
https://touringplans.com/magic-kingdom/attractions/opening-dates
https://touringplans.com/epcot/attractions/opening-dates
https://touringplans.com/hollywood-studios/attractions/opening-dates
https://touringplans.com/animal-kingdom/attractions/opening-dates
https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/disney-vacations/best-worst-disney-world-rides
https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g34515-Activities-c56-t278-zfr8428124-Orlando_Florida.html

fields.name: ride_name
fields.title: Ride_name
fields.description: full name of ride

fields.name: park_location
fields.title: Park_location
fields.description: park name: MK = Magic Kingdom, EC = Epcot Center, HS = Hollywood Studios, AK = Animal Kingdom

fields.name: park_area
fields.title: Park_area
fields.description: specifica area inside the park

fields.name: ride_type_all
fields.title: Ride_type_all
fields.description: specifications of ride style including thrill, spinning, slow, small drops, big drops, dark, scary, and water

fields.name: ride_type_thrill
fields.title: Ride_type_thrill
fields.description: yes-no indicator of thrill ride type

fields.name: ride_type_spinning
fields.title: Ride_type_spinning
fields.description: yes-no indicator of spinning ride type

fields.name: ride_type_slow
fields.title: Ride_type_slow
fields.description: yes-no indicator of slow ride type

fields.name: ride_type_small_drops
fields.title: Ride_type_small_drops
fields.description: yes-no indicator of ride type with small drops

fields.name: ride_type_big_drops
fields.title: Ride_type_big_drops
fields.description: yes-no indicator of ride type with big drops

fields.name: ride_type_dark
fields.title: Ride_type_dark
fields.description: yes-no indicator of a ride that is dark

fields.name: ride_type_scary
fields.title: Ride_type_scary
fields.description: yes-no indicator of a ride that is scary

fields.name: ride_type_water
fields.title: Ride_type_water
fields.description: yes-no indicator of a ride that has water- you may get wet!

fields.name: fast_pass
fields.title: Fast_pass
fields.description: yes-no indicator if the ride offers fast pass option

fields.name: classic
fields.title: Classic
fields.description: yes-no indicator if this is considered a classic ride

fields.name: age_interest_all
fields.title: Age_interest_all
fields.description: specifications of age area that would enjoy this ride

fields.name: age_interest_preschoolers
fields.title: Age_interest_preschoolers
fields.description: yes-no indicator that preschoolers would enjoy this ride

fields.name: age_interest_kids
fields.title: Age_interest_kids
fields.description: yes-no indicator that kids would enjoy this ride

fields.name: age_interest_tweens
fields.title: Age_interest_tweens
fields.description: yes-no indicator that tweens would enjoy this ride

fields.name: age_interest_teens
fields.title: Age_interest_teens
fields.description: yes-no indicator that teens would enjoy this ride

fields.name: age_interest_adults
fields.title: Age_interest_adults
fields.description: yes-no indicator that adults would enjoy this ride

fields.name: height_req_inches
fields.title: Height_req_inches
fields.description: height requirement for ride in inches. 0 = no height requirement

fields.name: ride_duration_min
fields.title: Ride_duration_min
fields.description: how long the ride lasts to the nearest quarter minute

fields.name: open_date
fields.title: Open_date
fields.description: exact date that the ride was open and available to the public

fields.name: age_of_ride_days
fields.title: Age_of_ride_days
fields.description: how long the ride has been open in days

fields.name: age_of_ride_years
fields.title: Age_of_ride_years
fields.description: how long the ride has been open in years

fields.name: age_of_ride_total
fields.title: Age_of_ride_total
fields.description: how long the ride has been open in years, months, and days

fields.name: tl_rank
fields.title: TL_rank
fields.description: ranking of rides (1 being the best) provided byÂ Travel and Leisure, NA means they were not included in the list, some ratings may be missing as they belonged to non-ride attractions

fields.name: ta_stars
fields.title: TA_Stars
fields.description: number of stars given by TripAdvisor visitors out of 5 stars (5 stars being the best rating), NA means no data is available yet
